briefdescription.para: Called right after object was spawned into the world.
Called to glMultiply in the Object's camera matrix.
Called to set Object's location, orientation and vel.
Called to advance internal timers,animation state and pose, check gamepad.
Deprecated, use animate? Called to precalculate necessary transformations - matrices, mountpoints, pos .
Called to render solid non-translucent parts of the object.
Called to render translucent object-parts and visual effects.
Called to render HUD-contents as seen when looking through the objects-eyes.
Called to deal damage to the object with the damage arriving at or from the given local position ie.

detaileddescription.para: relative to the object itself. @localpos input location vector relative to the object. @damage amount of damage to deal to the object. @enactor the object dealing the damage to this object.

briefdescription.para: Called to constrain the given world position particle (with radius) to the object boundary hull ie.

detaileddescription.para:
place the worldpos to the nearest boundary hull position if the worldpos is inside the object's hull. localpos delivers in case of impact the local position relative to the object of the corrected worldpos. @worldpos input location vector in world coordinates. @radius radius of the checked particle in world dimensions. @localpos output adjusted location vector.
the intrusion depth.
